_meanings:
About to take
place, about to happen, likely to be,
often used like {#BAvya#} impersonally,
{%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} in the neuter gender and 
singular number, with the instrumental
of the subject and the predicative
word; {#tvayA mama sahAyena BavitavyaM#} <ls>Ś. 2</ls>;
{#guruRA kAraRena BavitavyaM#} <ls>Ś. 6.</ls>

What is destined to happen;  
{#BavitavyaM Bavatyeva yadvivarmanasi sTitaM#} Subhāsh
